experience.title: Assistant Manager
experience.description: Category manager of all things Nutrition on Man Matters (TG- gym and fitness enthusiasts, general health and daily nutrition for men)Key highlights:- Drive P&L, category strategy, new product strategy, category expansion and NPS based on deep customer insights achieving a top line growth of 200% of the category - Ideated and executed multiple experiments on the category for ad narratives with perf marketing budgets - Deeper categorisation of Active and Daily nutrition, addressing the right pain points of the customer with landing page information and narrative reflection- Engaged influencer led strategies with fitness based influencers to help instil the narrative of fitness via content marketing - Category analysis with retention marketing strategies (using CRM and constant communication), resulting in the 10% month-on-month of the category

experience.title: Entrepreneur in Residence
experience.description: As a fellow, I had a chance to explore multiple functions across Mosaic Wellness; both on the demand and the supply side.My first stint started in the founderâ€™s office. ARR in India)- Finding PMF on the supplements category via Amazon marketplaces via acquisition and retention marketing channels- Attained a $1000 DRR within 2 months of execution on marketing strategies and consistent market research- Executed a D2C full stack funnel experiment, stabilising CAC and running performance marketing ad narratives

experience.title: Founder & Podcaster
experience.description: EntreMaze is a Podcast series to engage with the startup ecosystem of India and promote the fundamental concepts of Entrepreneurship to aspirants. I curate content on Instagram and host entrepreneurs to record a podcast on a fundamental subject of entrepreneurship. Published on Spotify, Google Podcast, Apple Podcast, Anchor, Radio Public and Beaker, I strive to be better equipped and able to be a successful entrepreneur that can solve a problem!Tune in right away! ğŸ™

experience.title: Founderâ€™s office
experience.description: The founder's office role at The Yarn Bazaar was an exhilarating one. It entailed the following:- Engaging with third-party vendors with the product team to enable internal and external business processes- Managing internal operations of the team to optimize business development- Making a competitor analysis of the B2B marketplace segment and audit business models- Strategise future components of the yarn marketplace to be incorporated within the company for additional business revenue- Planning an early stage fundraising round and maintaining investor relations

experience.title: Executive Assistant
experience.description: Gormei Tasteware is a company based out of aging Kong. Conducting a festive drive called The Gormei Feast - TGF in the month of December, I was responsible for the overall functioning of the business; from orders, logistics, data analysis and social media marketing, my experience at Gormei was a threshold into the F&B industry where I learnt a lot about the functions of a startup business.
